  • Classes in SystemEnvironment used by SystemEnvironment
    Class
    Description
    ConcurrencyController
    Manages concurrency control operations for a processor.
    Core
    Represents a single processing core in the simulator.
    DynamicVoltageRegulator
    Dynamic Voltage Regulator facade that coordinates DVFS-related events.
    PartitionDistributor
    Distributes tasks across processor cores using a pluggable partition algorithm.
    Processor
    Central coordinator for the real-time simulator that owns cores, core sets, the global scheduler, concurrency controller, DVFS regulator and the task and resource sets.
    Scheduler
    Facade over a priority-driven scheduling algorithm for either a global or a local scheduler.
    Simulator
    Top-level simulation orchestrator that ties together the Processor, workload/resource settings and result collection.
